Ayrton Drug Manufacturing Limited bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ọgwụ na Ghana

E depụtara ụlọ ọrụ azụmaahịa ahụ na ndepụta ngwaahịa nke Ghana Stock Exchange, GSE All-Share Index.
Ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe ọ rụrụ dabeere na Tesano, nke dị na Accra
Pọtụfoliyo ngwaahịa nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ gụnyere ọgwụ mgbochi hypertensive, hematinics, nkwadebe dermatological, ọgwụ nje, dewormers, ndị na-egbu mgbu na ọgwụ mgbochi mkpali
Na February 2010 Adcock Ingram, ụlọ ọrụ ọgwụ South Africa nwetara pasenti Iri isii na isii mbak na ụlọ ọrụ.
Na Jenụwarị 2020, Ayrton Drug Manufacturing Limited na ụlọ ọrụ ọgwụ abụọ ọzọ, Dannex Limited na Starwin Products Limited, agbakọtalarị ma depụta aha ha na GSE dị ka DAS Pharma.
